availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Price Jr. (Louisville, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Attorney in Louisville in 1860. Partner in the law firm Price & Woods.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 493.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1859-60 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1859), 186.
Henry Pirtle, ed., Rules of Proceeding of the Louisville Chancery Court (Louisville: Hull & Brother Printers, 1855), 22.
KYR-0001-004-0193.
